attributes.additional_details: Kurds are the largest nation without independent country in the world yet they have not benefited from BBC world service unlike other nation which BBC has provided news and some program on their languages around the world, BBC is one of the most reliabel broadcasting institution but  people of Kurdistan  have not been given the chance to listen or to view on their language  about British politics and British culture, we ask now the British government should recommend that BBC must give the opportunity to Kurds  to have BBC Kurdish web page and BBC Kurdish radio like any other nation.
